---
agent: 'agent'
description: 'Analyze a transcript. Extract key points, summarize sections, and identify action items.'
---

Analyze the provided transcript and perform the following tasks:
- Extract key points discussed in the transcript.
- Summarize each section of the transcript.
- Identify any action items mentioned, along with responsible parties and deadlines if specified.
- Identify relevant places to apply found action items to.
- Populate todo lists based on the action items.
